title: クラウド日程調整 | waaq Link（ワークリンク）
content:
waaq corporation is pleased to announce that it has established a new service provided by the Company. has established the following privacy policy regarding the handling of user information, including personal information about the user, in the services provided by the Company. has established the following privacy policy regarding the handling of user information including personal information about the user in the service provided by the Company. the following privacy policy has been established.

This is a policy for the handling of User information, including personal information about the User, on the Service as set out below.

1. user information to be collected and the method of collection
As used in this policy, "user information" means information pertaining to the identification of the user, behavioral history of the communication service, and other information generated or stored in relation to the user or the user's device on the user's smartphone, PC, or other device, and which is collected by the Company in accordance with this policy. The Company shall do so. The user information we collect on the Service, depending on how it is collected, will be as follows.

　(1)Information provided by users
　In order for you to use the Service, you are required to provide the following information.

　◦Name
　◦Email address
　◦Credit card information
　◦Schedule information
　◦Information about the person to be contacted, such as email address and phone number
　◦Other information entered by you in the form specified by us

　(2)Information provided by other services in conjunction with the User's use of the Service by allowing the User to collaborate with such other services

　When a user gives permission to collaborate with an external service such as a social network service, the following information will be collected from the external service based on the information agreed upon at the time of permission.

　The ID used by the user for such external services
　Other information that the user has allowed to be disclosed to the collaborators based on the privacy settings of such external services

　(3) Information collected by the Company when the User uses the Service
　We may collect information about your access to the Service and how you use it. This includes the following information

　◦Device information
　◦Log information
　◦Cookies and Anonymous IDs
　◦Location information

2. Purpose of use
2-1 User Information will be used for the provision of the Service as set forth in Section 2-2 and may also be used for other purposes as set forth in Section 2-3.

2-2 The following are the specific purposes of use of user information related to the provision of this service.

(1)For the operation and management of the Service
(2)To provide, maintain, protect and improve the Service, including the receipt of registration, identification and calculation of usage fees for the Service. (3)To provide information and respond to inquiries about the service. (4) To respond to violations of the Company's rules and policies regarding the Service. (4) To respond to acts in violation of the terms and conditions of the Service. (5)To better suit, enrich and improve the content of the Service, our other services and advertisements, to consider new services, to conduct research and data collection, and for research and development
(6)To notify you of any changes to the Terms of Service. (7) For purposes incidental to the above purposes of use

2-3 Other purposes of use other than 2-2 above are as follows

Purpose of Use Items of corresponding user information
(1) Identify an individual in connection with the Company's services Generate statistical data in a format that cannot be processed
To do so
◦Terminal information
◦Log information
◦Cookies and Anonymous IDs
◦Location information

(2) For the distribution and display of the Company's or a third party's advertisements ◦Terminal information
◦Log information
◦Cookies and Anonymous IDs
◦Location information

(3) For other marketing purposes
◦Name
◦Email address
◦Other forms specified by us
◦Information entered by the user

3. Method of Notification, Publication or Obtaining Consent, and Request to Discontinue Use

(1) Terminal information
(2) Location information

3-2 The User may request to discontinue the use of all or part of the User Information by making the prescribed settings for the Service, and in this case, the Company shall promptly discontinue the use of such information in accordance with the Company's regulations. In this case, the Company will promptly terminate the use of the information in accordance with the Company's policy.

4. Third Party Provision
The Company shall not provide personal information to any third party without the prior consent of the User, except in cases where disclosure of such information is permitted under the Personal Information Protection Law and other laws and regulations. However, this does not apply in the following cases

(1) When the Company outsources all or part of the handling of personal information to the extent necessary to achieve the purpose of use
(2) When personal information is provided as a result of the succession of business due to a merger or other reasons
(3) When it is necessary to cooperate with a national agency, a local government or a person entrusted with such a body in the execution of its duties as prescribed by law and obtaining the user's consent is likely to interfere with the execution of such duties
(4) Other cases as permitted by the Personal Information Protection Law and other laws and regulations

5. Disclosure of Personal Information
Personal information If the user requests disclosure of his or her personal information in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Information Protection Law, the Company shall disclose the information to the user without delay after confirming that the request is made by the user himself or herself (if the personal information does not exist, the Company shall notify the user to that effect). (If the personal information in question does not exist, we will notify the user to that effect. However, this does not apply in cases where the Company is under no obligation to disclose the information due to the Personal Information Protection Law or other laws and regulations. Please note that a fee of 1,000 yen per request will be charged for the disclosure of personal information.

6. Correction of Personal Information and Discontinuance of Use
6-1 If we are requested by a user to correct personal information in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Information Protection Law on the grounds that the information is untrue, or if we are told that the information is being handled beyond the scope of the previously announced purpose of use, or if we believe that the information has been collected through deception or other wrongful means, we will take steps to correct the information. If, for any reason, the Company is requested to suspend the use of personal information in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Information Protection Law, the Company will conduct the necessary investigation without delay after confirming that the request was made by the User himself or herself, and based on the results, correct or suspend the use of personal information, and notify the User to that effect. If we decide, based on reasonable grounds, not to correct or suspend the use of personal information, we will notify the user.

6-2 If the Company determines that it is necessary to respond to the User's request for deletion of his/her personal information, the Company shall delete the personal information after confirming that the request is made by the User himself/herself and shall notify the User to that effect.

6-3 The preceding two paragraphs do not apply if the Company is under no obligation to correct or suspend the use of personal information under the Personal Information Protection Law or other laws.

7. Management of Third-Party Information
We may ask third parties with whom you communicate through the Service to provide you with information We may ask third parties with whom you communicate through the Service to provide you with information. We will manage such Third Party Information appropriately.

8. Contact Us
Please contact the following office for any comments, questions, complaints and other inquiries regarding the handling of user information.

Address: 2F Central Plaza, 4-25-1 Iidabashi, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo, 102-0072, Japan waaq corporation
E-mail: service@waaq.space

9. Procedure for changing the privacy policy
The Company shall review the operation of the handling of User Information from time to time and strive for continuous improvement, and may change this policy as necessary. However, in the event of a change in the content of the Policy that requires the consent of the User under the law, the Company shall obtain the consent of the User in a manner prescribed by the Company.

10.Data Retention
How long we retain your Personal Data that are acquired by the Service or via third party apps depends on the type of data and the purpose for which we process the data. We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

excerpt: 予約受付から複数人の投票まで日程調整で効率化できるビジネス向けスケジュール自動化ツールです。Web会議（Zoom・Google Meet・Microsoft Teams）と連携し、アポ確定後URLを自動で発行します。Outlook Office365やGmailとカレンダー連携してスムーズに御社のDXを一緒に推進します。
siteName: クラウド日程調整 | waaq Link（ワークリンク）
